snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic survived a stern test from qualifier Bjorn Fratangelo to make the third round of the BNP Paribas Open on Sunday, with Spaniard Rafa Nadal also needing three sets to advance from a tricky opening clash....
lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic survived a stern test from qualifier Bjorn Fratangelo to make the third round of the BNP Paribas Open on Sunday, with Spaniard Rafa Nadal also needing three sets to advance from a tricky opening clash.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic and Nadal Tested in Indian Wells, Serena Strolls
headline.main: Djokovic and Nadal Tested in Indian Wells, Serena Strolls
